organizations: University of Texas at San Antonio
lead_paragraph: Starting with one football and one helmet, the former Miami coach Larry Coker aims to have Texas-San Antonio competing in the Football Championship Subdivision in 2011.
snippet: Starting with one football and one helmet, the former Miami coach Larry Coker aims to have Texas-San Antonio competing in the Football Championship Subdivision in 2011.
